testcase.name: Navigate to SignIn Page from Landing page
testcase.system-out: Given SkinnyTies launched and active........................................passed When I click the SignInLink.................................................passed Then SignIn page should be launched.........................................passed And SignIn page should have email and password field displayed and enabled..passed And I Click the SkinnyTies logo Landing page should be displayed............passed

testcase.name: Navigate to Registration Page from Landing page
testcase.system-out: Given SkinnyTies launched and active........................................passed When I Click the Register link..............................................passed Then Register page should be displayed......................................passed And Register page should have First Name and Last Name fields...............passed And Email, password and Confirm password fields for Account Info should be enabled and displayed.passed

testcase.name: Click Register button with out entering value in Required fields
testcase.system-out: Given SkinnyTies launched and active........................................passed And Navigated to Register Page..............................................passed When I click Register button with out entering value in Required fields.....passed Then mandatory field warning should be displayed for all the fields.........passed And The Register page should be active......................................passed
